description:
High atop a cliff sits the mansion known as Shadows House, home to a faceless clan that pretends to live like nobles. They express their emotions through living dolls that also endlessly clean the home of soot. One such servant, Emilico, aids her master Kate as they learn more about themselves and the mysteries of the house.

(Source: Funimation)

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Butler
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a butler.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Death Game
tags.description: Features characters participating in a game, where failure results in death.

tags.name: Drugs
tags.description: Prominently features the usage of drugs such as opioids, stimulants, hallucinogens etc.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

node.description:
[Official Website](http://so-ma-to.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/somatoma) | [Blog](http://somatoblog.blog31.fc2.com/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=422553)

A mangaka duo consisting of writer and designer Nori (のり) and artist Hisshi (ひっし), who were former assistants of Saitou Pro, the manga studio of [Takao Saitou](https://anilist.co/staff/97907/).

__Hometown:__ Saitama City, Saitama Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Omiya Koryo High School and SHOBI College of Music

[Profile (One Music)](https://one-music.jp/suehiro/index.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kenichiro_s) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kenichiro.suehiro)

A Japanese pianist, composer, and arranger.
He did photography work initally. Also adept in animating.

He is an art director and supervisor, who was a long time member of Bihou until 2007 when he went to head the background art department in Totonyan. He belongs to the anime production group Neko-Nanban-Tei together with director Watanabe Takashi and his wife Miyata Naomi.

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDGKZdgRlP__KOCgC58WeWA/featured) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/reo_peko/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/xoxleoxox) | [Website](https://www.reona-reona.com/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/intl-pt/artist/2SIBY7Jwq1kYng12Zguo3C) 

A Japanese female pop singer under the label SACRA MUSIC, who was a finalist of the 2017 SACRA MUSIC audition. She debuted as "Elsa Kanzaki" (a character in Sword Art Online) on July 4, 2018 with the character mini-album ELZA and as "ReoNa" on August 29, 2018 with the single SWEET HURT.
Representative director of [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Board Director at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).
__Yoshihisa Heishi__ is a Japanese magazine editor, animation planner and producer. He currently works for Shueisha and was an editor-in-chief for Weekly Shounen Jump between 2011-2017.
